data.title: Early Deaths
data.text:
Roosevelt County Early Deaths 1909 to 1941

Re-typed from record by Karen Eddy

Return to Main Page

In 1919 New Mexico began recording deaths on a state-wide basis. Some counties had death records prior to that time. Following are the early death records for Roosevelt County re-typed by Karen Eddy based on an article in the New Mexico Genealogist September 1993, Vol. XXXII No. 3, pg 81, by Ann L. Mossman. This record has been modified from the original to fit this format. Scroll right to see all of chart.
